column4: you mean instead of having to worry about whether you've got the latest version of winxp/ie, just so it won't automatically download the lastest worm that's in vogue?

hrm...is there some tool that will help me convert my ubuntu ext3 partition to resier4fs?
so basically create a new reiserfs parition...copy the contents of ext3 to that and then update grub?
shucks...i was hoping it would easy as something like partition magic
since i dont have space to create a new partition
performance wise which is better ext3 or reiser4fs?
i dont know i remeber reading something about data journaling and speed....
i dont even know
well for now i'll stick with ext3 then
As long as they both keep the files safe, who cares? :-p
i used resier with other distros had no issues
but then i never used them extensively enough to experience data loss
